greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of n-covers of a labeled n-set.
comment: Also, number of n X n rational {0,1}-matrices with no zero rows or columns and with all rows distinct, up to permutation of rows.
formula: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} log(1+(2^n-1)*x)^n/((1+(2^n-1)*x)*n!). - _Paul D. Hanna_ and _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 16 2008
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 21 2000
